metadata.dc:author: Piñeiro, Esperanza Arriaga
Castell, Rosamaría Alberdi
Blanco, Jaime Zabala
metadata.dc:description: This article is the fruit of various circumstances. In the first place, it is the result of a long reflection shared by its authors; it is also the proof of the primary interests the authors hold specific time; and lastly, it is the reflection of our opinion regarding how nurses should with their compromise a future treating patients.
metadata.dc:title: La ética del cuidado: una propuesta con futuro para las enfermeras y las empresas sanitarias.
[The ethics of treatment: a proposal having a future for nurses and health companies].
